# Support

Thank you for using this starter template for Webflow Designer Extensions! If you need help, please review the following options:

## ğŸ“š Documentation

- See the [README](README.md) for setup and usage instructions.
- Review the [CONTRIBUTING](CONTRIBUTING.md) guide for development and PR tips.

## ğŸ Bug Reports

- Please open an issue on GitHub with clear steps to reproduce, expected vs. actual behavior, and any relevant logs or screenshots.

## ğŸ’¡ Feature Requests

- Open a GitHub issue labeled as a feature request. Describe your use case and why it would be helpful.

## ğŸ¤ Community and Questions

- Use GitHub Discussions for general questions, ideas, or to connect with others.

## ğŸ› ï¸ Self-Service

- Check closed issues and discussions for similar questions or solutions.
- Search the [Webflow Designer Extensions documentation](https://developers.webflow.com/designer/docs/designer-extensions). General support for Webflow Designer Extensions will not be provided here and all questions should be directed to Webflow support channels. Issues or discussions not related to this starter template may be closed.

---

Thank you for helping make this project better! If you have feedback on the support process, please open an issue or discussion.
